verses.verse: And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and spake <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846> again <WG3825> by <WG1722> parables <WG3850>, and said <WG3004> <WG5723>,
The kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is like <WG3666> <WG5681> unto a certain <WG444> king <WG935>, which <WG3748> made <WG4160> <WG5656> a marriage <WG1062> for his <WG846> son <WG5207>,

And <WG2532> sent forth <WG649> <WG5656> his <WG846> servants <WG1401> to call <WG2564> <WG5658> them that were bidden <WG2564> <WG5772> to <WG1519> the wedding <WG1062>: and <WG2532> they would <WG2309> <WG5707> not <WG3756> come <WG2064> <WG5629>.

Again <WG3825>, he sent forth <WG649> <WG5656> other <WG243> servants <WG1401>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Tell <WG2036> <WG5628> them which are bidden <WG2564> <WG5772>, Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, I have prepared <WG2090> <WG5656> my <WG3450> dinner <WG712>: my <WG3450> oxen <WG5022> and <WG2532> my fatlings <WG4619> are killed <WG2380> <WG5772>, and <WG2532> all things <WG3956> are ready <WG2092>: come <WG1205> <WG5773> unto <WG1519> the marriage <WG1062>.

But <WG1161> they made light of <WG272> <WG5660> it, and went their ways <WG565> <WG5627>, one <WG3303> to <WG1519> his <WG2398> farm <WG68>, another <WG1161> to <WG1519> his <WG846> merchandise <WG1711>:
And <WG1161> the remnant <WG3062> took <WG2902> <WG5660> his <WG846> servants <WG1401>, and entreated them spitefully <WG5195> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> slew <WG615> <WG5656> them.

But <WG1161> when the king <WG935> heard <WG191> <WG5660> thereof, he was wroth <WG3710> <WG5681>: and <WG2532> he sent forth <WG3992> <WG5660> his <WG846> armies <WG4753>, and destroyed <WG622> <WG5656> those <WG1565> murderers <WG5406>, and <WG2532> burned up <WG1714> <WG5656> their <WG846> city <WG4172>.

Then <WG5119> saith he <WG3004> <WG5719> to his <WG846> servants <WG1401>, <WG3303> The wedding <WG1062> is <WG2076> <WG5748> ready <WG2092>, but <WG1161> they which were bidden <WG2564> <WG5772> were <WG2258> <WG5713> not <WG3756> worthy <WG514>.

Go ye <WG4198> <WG5737> therefore <WG3767> into <WG1909> the highways <WG1327> <WG3598>, and <WG2532> as many as <WG3745> <WG302> ye shall find <WG2147> <WG5632>, bid <WG2564> <WG5657> to <WG1519> the marriage <WG1062>.

So <WG2532> those <WG1565> servants <WG1401> went out <WG1831> <WG5631> into <WG1519> the highways <WG3598>, and gathered together <WG4863> <WG5627> all <WG3956> as many as <WG3745> they found <WG2147> <WG5627>, both <WG5037> bad <WG4190> and <WG2532> good <WG18>: and <WG2532> the wedding <WG1062> was furnished <WG4130> <WG5681> with guests <WG345> <WG5740>.

And <WG1161> when <WG1525> the king <WG935> came in <WG1525> <WG5631> to see <WG2300> <WG5664> the guests <WG345> <WG5740>, he saw <WG1492> <WG5627> there <WG1563> a man <WG444> which had <WG1746> not <WG3756> on <WG1746> <WG5765> a wedding <WG1062> garment <WG1742>:

And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Friend <WG2083>, how <WG4459> camest thou <WG1525> <WG5627> in hither <WG5602> not <WG3361> having <WG2192> <WG5723> a wedding <WG1062> garment <WG1742>? And <WG1161> he was speechless <WG5392> <WG5681>.

Then <WG5119> said <WG2036> <WG5627> the king <WG935> to the servants <WG1249>, Bind <WG1210> <WG5660> him <WG846> hand <WG5495> and <WG2532> foot <WG4228>, and take <WG142> him <WG846> away <WG142> <WG5657>, and <WG2532> cast <WG1544> <WG5628> him into <WG1519> outer <WG1857> darkness <WG4655>; there <WG1563> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> weeping <WG2805> and <WG2532> gnashing <WG1030> of teeth <WG3599>.
For <WG1063> many <WG4183> are <WG1526> <WG5748> called <WG2822>, but <WG1161> few <WG3641> are chosen <WG1588>.
Then <WG5119> went <WG4198> <WG5679> the P'rushim <WG5330>, and took <WG2983> <WG5627> counsel <WG4824> how <WG3704> they might entangle <WG3802> <WG5661> him <WG846> in <WG1722> his talk <WG3056>.

And <WG2532> they sent out <WG649> <WG5719> unto him <WG846> their <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> with <WG3326> the Herodians <WG2265>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Master <WG1320>, we know <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754> thou art <WG1488> <WG5748> true <WG227>, and <WG2532> teachest <WG1321> <WG5719> the way <WG3598> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> truth <WG225>, <WG2532> neither <WG3756> carest <WG3199> <WG5719> thou <WG4671> for <WG4012> any <WG3762> man: for <WG1063> thou regardest <WG991> <WG5719> not <WG1519> <WG3756> the person <WG4383> of men <WG444>.

Tell <WG2036> <WG5628> us <WG2254> therefore <WG3767>, What <WG5101> thinkest <WG1380> <WG5719> thou <WG4671>? Is it Torahful <WG1832> <WG5748> to give <WG1325> <WG5629> tribute <WG2778> unto Caesar <WG2541>, or <WG2228> not <WG3756>?
But <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> perceived <WG1097> <WG5631> their <WG846> wickedness <WG4189>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Why <WG5101> tempt ye <WG3985> <WG5719> me <WG3165>, ye hypocrites <WG5273>?
Shew <WG1925> <WG5657> me <WG3427> the tribute <WG2778> money <WG3546>. And <WG1161> they brought <WG4374> <WG5656> unto him <WG846> a penny <WG1220>.
And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Whose <WG5101> is this <WG3778> image <WG1504> and <WG2532> superscription <WG1923>?

They say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Caesar's <WG2541>. Then <WG5119> saith he <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Render <WG591> <WG5628> therefore <WG3767> unto Caesar <WG2541> the things which are <WG3588> Caesar's <WG2541>; and <WG2532> unto 'Elohim <WG2316> the things that are <WG3588> 'Elohim's <WG2316>.
When <WG2532> they had heard <WG191> <WG5660> these words, they marvelled <WG2296> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> left <WG863> <WG5631> him <WG846>, and went their way <WG565> <WG5627>.

The same <WG1722> <WG1565> day <WG2250> came <WG4334> <WG5656> to him <WG846> the TZ'dukim <WG4523>, which <WG3588> say <WG3004> <WG5723> that there is <WG1511> <WG5750> no <WG3361> resurrection <WG386>, and <WG2532> asked <WG1905> <WG5656> him <WG846>,

Saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Master <WG1320>, Mosheh <WG3475> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, If <WG1437> a man <WG5100> die <WG599> <WG5632>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> no <WG3361> children <WG5043>, his <WG846> brother <WG80> shall marry <WG1918> <WG5692> his <WG846> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> raise up <WG450> <WG5692> seed <WG4690> unto his <WG846> brother <WG80>.

Now <WG1161> there were <WG2258> <WG5713> with <WG3844> us <WG2254> seven <WG2033> brethren <WG80>: and <WG2532> the first <WG4413>, when he had married a wife <WG1060> <WG5660>, deceased <WG5053> <WG5656>, and <WG2532>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> no <WG3361> issue <WG4690>, left <WG863> <WG5656> his <WG846> wife <WG1135> unto his <WG846> brother <WG80>:
Likewise <WG3668> the second <WG1208> also <WG2532>, and <WG2532> the third <WG5154>, unto <WG2193> the seventh <WG2033>.
And <WG1161> last <WG5305> of all <WG3956> the woman <WG1135> died <WG599> <WG5627> also <WG2532>.

Therefore <WG3767> in <WG1722> the resurrection <WG386> whose <WG5101> wife <WG1135> shall she be <WG2071> <WG5704> of the seven <WG2033>? for <WG1063> they all <WG3956> had <WG2192> <WG5627> her <WG846>.

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and <WG1161> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Ye do err <WG4105> <WG5744>, not <WG3361> knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> the scriptures <WG1124>, nor <WG3366> the power <WG1411> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> in <WG1722> the resurrection <WG386> they neither <WG3777> marry <WG1060> <WG5719>, nor <WG3777> are given in marriage <WG1547> <WG5743>, but <WG235> are <WG1526> <WG5748> as <WG5613> the angels <WG32> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

But <WG1161> as touching <WG4012> the resurrection <WG386> of the dead <WG3498>, have ye <WG314> not <WG3756> read <WG314> <WG5627> that which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> <WG5685> unto you <WG5213> by <WG5259> 'Elohim <WG2316>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>,

I <WG1473> am <WG1510> <WG5748> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of Avraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of Yitz'chak <WG2464>, and <WG2532> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of Ya`akov <WG2384>? 'Elohim <WG2316> is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> the 'Elohim <WG2316> of the dead <WG3498>, but <WG235> of the living <WG2198> <WG5723>.
And <WG2532> when the multitude <WG3793> heard <WG191> <WG5660> this, they were astonished <WG1605> <WG5712> at <WG1909> his <WG846> doctrine <WG1322>.

But <WG1161> when the P'rushim <WG5330> had heard <WG191> <WG5660> that <WG3754> he had put <WG5392> the TZ'dukim <WG4523> to silence <WG5392> <WG5656>, they were gathered together <WG4863> <WG5681> <WG1909> <WG846>.

Then <WG2532> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> them <WG846>, which was a Torahyer <WG3544>, asked <WG1905> <WG5656> him a question, tempting <WG3985> <WG5723> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> saying <WG3004> <WG5723>,
Master <WG1320>, which <WG4169> is the great <WG3173> Mitzvah <WG1785> in <WG1722> the Torah <WG3551>?

<WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Thou shalt love <WG25> <WG5692> the YY <WG2962> thy <WG4675> 'Elohim <WG2316> with <WG1722> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> heart <WG2588>, and <WG2532> with <WG1722> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> soul <WG5590>, and <WG2532> with <WG1722> all <WG3650> thy <WG4675> mind <WG1271>.
This <WG3778> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the first <WG4413> and <WG2532> great <WG3173> Mitzvah <WG1785>.
And <WG1161> the second <WG1208> is like <WG3664> unto it <WG846> <WG5625> <WG3778>, Thou shalt love <WG25> <WG5692> thy <WG4675> neighbour <WG4139> as <WG5613> thyself <WG4572>.
On <WG1722> these <WG5025> two <WG1417> Mitzvot <WG1785> hang <WG2910> <WG5743> all <WG3650> the Torah <WG3551> and <WG2532> the prophets <WG4396>.
While <WG1161> the P'rushim <WG5330> were gathered together <WG4863> <WG5772>, Yeshuw`a <WG2424> asked <WG1905> <WG5656> them <WG846>,

Saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, What <WG5101> think <WG1380> <WG5719> ye <WG5213> of <WG4012> Moshiach <WG5547>? whose <WG5101> son <WG5207> is he <WG2076> <WG5748>? They say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, The Son of David <WG1138>.
He saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, How <WG4459> then <WG3767> doth David <WG1138> in <WG1722> spirit <WG4151> call <WG2564> <WG5719> him <WG846> YY <WG2962>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>,

The YY <WG2962> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto my <WG3450> YY <WG2962>, Sit thou <WG2521> <WG5737> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand <WG1188>, till <WG2193> <WG302> I make <WG5087> <WG5632> thine <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> thy <WG4675> footstool <WG5286> <WG4228>?
If <WG1487> David <WG1138> then <WG3767> call <WG2564> <WG5719> him <WG846> YY <WG2962>, how <WG4459> is he <WG2076> <WG5748> his <WG846> son <WG5207>?

And <WG2532> no man <WG3762> was able <WG1410> <WG5711> to answer <WG611> <WG5677> him <WG846> a word <WG3056>, neither <WG3761> durst <WG5111> <WG5656> any <WG5100> man from <WG575> that <WG1565> day <WG2250> forth ask <WG1905> <WG5658> him <WG846> any more <WG3765> questions.
